3.message: Oh thank God! I thought we'd be stuck out here on our own!

4.message: Right, sorry. Got ahead of myself.

5.message: My name is Alex. I'm the leader of a hiking party in the Felnor forest.

6.message: We're kinda in a real pickle...

choice2.message: What do you mean by 'a real pickle'?

7.message: I know this forest like the back of my hand...

8.message: But for some reason, I don't know where I am...

9.message: I'm seeing things I've never seen before.

10.message: Well, I'm looking at a sign with weird looking hieroglyphics or something on it.

11.message: And I can assure you, that is not normal.

12.message: I've hiked this route for years and this has never been here.

choice1.message: Are you sure it's not new?

13.message: It looks super old, like it's been here for ages...

15.message: Not to mention the fact that the trail is different.

16.message: And I mean like, super different.

17.message: When we started hiking it was the same...

18.message: But as we got deeper in, the turns were different.

choice1.message: What do you mean by different?

19.message: I mean where we would turn left, there's a right instead.

21.message: When we started hiking it was the same...

22.message: So, boss, what's the plan for getting us out?

choice1.message: I'll send an evac to your position.

choice2.message: I can try and guide you out.

24.message: If that's the best course of action...
